titleStmt.title: Mappa mundi, otherwyse called the compasse, and cyrcuet of the worlde and also the compasse of euery ilande, comprehendyd in the same.
titleStmt.author: Arnold, Richard, d. 1521? Chronicle. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge in S. Martyns parysshe, at the sygne of S. John̄ Euangelyst, besyde the duke of Suffolks places, at charynge Cross,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication from STC.
Taken from Richard Arnold's "Chronicle", published in 1503 with title: "In this boke is conteyned the names of ye baylifs custo[m]s mairs and sherefs of londo[n]" (STC 782).
Signature A3r, last line, ends: "and wonders"; B1r last line ends: "frankforth", and C1r last line reads: "The ile of Cecilia, is aboute VII".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: S. Martyns parysshe, at the sygne of S. John̄ Euangelyst, besyde the duke of Suffolks places, at charynge Cross
